      static java.util.Random rand 
      static org.jsfml.system.Vector2f[][] REGULAR_POLYGONS
      To use less calculation, the first 8 regular polygons are generated automatically for ease of use ranges from a equilateral triangle ([0]) to a regular decagon ([7])

      • getLazyNormal

        public static org.jsfml.system.Vector2f getLazyNormal(org.jsfml.system.Vector2f pt1,
                                                      org.jsfml.system.Vector2f pt2)
        Gets the normal of an edge without scaling it to a unit vector, to save some time on a costly sqrt function
        Parameters:
        pt1 - The first point
        pt2 - The second point
        Returns:
        The normal of the edge consisting of pt1 and pt2, but not a unit vector

      • randomOscillator

        public static Oscillator randomOscillator(float freqlow,
                                          float freqhigh,
                                          float minamp,
                                          float maxamp,
                                          float rangelow,
                                          float rangehigh,
                                          Oscillator.OscType type)
        Get a random oscillator
        Parameters:
        freqlow - The lowest freq
        freqhigh - The highest freq
        minamp - The minimum allowable amplitude
        maxamp - The maximum allowable amplitude
        rangelow - The lowest allowable value
        rangehigh - The highest allowable value
        type - The type the type of oscillator
        Returns:
        An oscillator with the specified properties. Note that the max amplitude will be clamped between (rangehigh-rangelow)/2.0. Avoid using negative amplitudes, and rather use phase shifts.

      • randomOscillator

        public static Oscillator randomOscillator(float freqlow,
                                          float freqhigh,
                                          float minamp,
                                          float maxamp,
                                          float offset,
                                          Oscillator.OscType type)
        Get a random oscillator
        Parameters:
        freqlow - The lowest freq
        freqhigh - The highest freq
        minamp - The minimum allowable amplitude
        maxamp - The maximum allowable amplitude
        offset - The offset
        type - The type the type of oscillator
        Returns:
        An oscillator with the specified properties centered about offset

      • approxParticleOffset

        public static org.jsfml.system.Vector2f approxParticleOffset(org.jsfml.system.Vector2f unitdir,
                                                             Entity e)
        Approximate where a particle could be such that the particle is outside the bounding box of an entity, taking x and y scales into account
        Parameters:
        unitdir - The direction in which the particle is offset
        e - The entity it is offset from
        Returns:
        The approximated offset

      • approxParticleOffset

        public static org.jsfml.system.Vector2f approxParticleOffset(org.jsfml.system.Vector2f unitdir,
                                                             Entity e,
                                                             float compensate)
        Approximate where a particle could be such that the particle is outside the bounding box of an entity, taking x and y scales into account, with an addition compensational offset in the direction of the offset
        Parameters:
        unitdir - The direction in which the particle is offset
        e - The entity it is offset from, positive for positive offset and negative for negative offset
        compensate - The magnitude of the compensating offset
        Returns:
        The approximated offset

      • colorWithVariation

        public static org.jsfml.graphics.Color colorWithVariation(org.jsfml.graphics.Color main,
                                                          int vary)
        Get a colour with a certain variation in the components
        Parameters:
        main - The main colour
        vary - The number with which to vary the RGBA components
        Returns:
        The varied colour

      • pointEntityInDirection

        public static void pointEntityInDirection(Entity e,
                                          org.jsfml.system.Vector2f dir)
        Point an entity in a certain direction based off a vector
        Parameters:
        e - The entity
        dir - The direction vector, which does not necessarily have to be a unit vector

      • convexPolyCollision

        public static boolean convexPolyCollision(org.jsfml.graphics.ConvexShape a,
                                          org.jsfml.graphics.ConvexShape b)
        Tests for collision between two convex polygons according to the separating axis theorem (SAT)
        Parameters:
        a - First convex polygon
        b - Second convex polygon
        Returns:
        whether they are colliding
